title: Penny Arcade Graves Guide
body:
1. Pick Graves
2. Go top
3. CS
4. Continue to CS
5. Ignore the flames against you that tell you you're 0-10-1. Mute all of them. They're all just shit players.
6. Beg your team to let you farm for extended periods of time
7. Continue to CS until you have like 450 CS.
8. Buy {{item:3812}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3508}} and only these items, no deviation allowed
9. Try and 1v5
10. Kill 3 of them but die, now you're 3-17-1. At least you can counterflame your team, saying you literally just 1v5'd and almost won. Doesn't matter that the enemy Darius is solocarrying or anything!
11. Try and 1v5 clearbot the wave
12. Succeed a few times, then get dove under the Nexus turrets and die for an 18th time.
13. Realize how fucking useless Penny Arcade Graves is and mourn over the loss of your 30 ladder points.
14. Never play Graves again.
